meanings.definition: To kill or damage plants or animals by exposure to winter conditions.
meanings.sent1: The cold weather can winterkill delicate flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers worry that the frost will winterkill their crops.
meanings.sent3: I hope the snow doesn't winterkill my favorite rose bush!
meanings.sent4: The icy wind seemed to winterkill the last bit of hope in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The freezing temperatures threatened to winterkill the fragile seedlings.

meanings.definition: The death or damage of plants or animals due to harsh winter conditions.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was devastated by the winterkill of his entire herd.
meanings.sent2: The wildlife refuge suffered a significant winterkill last year.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome joked that he was safe from winterkill since he's made of plastic!
meanings.sent4: The winterkill of the flowers painted a bleak picture of the harsh season.
meanings.sent5: The winterkill of the trees left a haunting silence in the forest.
